mentions.tacticalSituation: On Thursday, you will have the chance to vote in an election that will be decided in a small number of seats like Southampton. These seats can change the balance of power in parliament. No one other than the Conservatives can take a seat off Labour here. Don't let Labour and the Liberal Democrats pool their votes to stop Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: We need a strong government to get Brexit done. Only the Conservatives will get Brexit done so we can move forward. Don't let Labour and the Liberal Democrats pool their votes to stop Brexit.

quotes.text: We need a strong government to get Brexit done. Only the Conservatives will get Brexit done so we can move forward.

images.caption: Images of Royston Smith engaging with the community

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet puts a significant focus on Brexit and the tactical situation of voting in Southampton.
